thread.title: Corey Grove Named Senior Vice President of Insurance Operations at BETA Healthcare Group

author: cnbc.com
title: Corey Grove Named Senior Vice President of Insurance Operations at BETA Healthcare Group
text:
ALAMO, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- BETA Healthcare Group (BETA) announced today that Corey Grove has been named Senior Vice President of Insurance Operations. Mr. Grove was previously the Vice President of Underwriting and Client Services. In his new role, Mr. Grove will oversee all aspects of professional liability claims and underwriting, marketing and alternative risk and insurance services.
“Corey has demonstrated his ability to manage and lead with a sharp focus on BETA’s members, brokers, and staff as we have grown our core business and expanded into new lines and markets,” said Tom Wander, BETA’s Chief Executive Officer. “He believes strongly in delivering personalized high-quality products and services. His additional responsibilities will allow BETA to further integrate functions to increase efficiencies to better serve our internal and external customers.” “It is a real privilege to have the opportunity in this expanded leadership role to continue to deliver and refine BETA’s strong line-up of products and industry-leading services,” added Mr. Grove. “We are fortunate at BETA to have governing boards and a management team that are focused on providing excellent service and value to our members. I look forward to continuing and, where prudent, expanding BETA’s programs that deliver on our service commitment.”
Mr. Grove has worked at BETA for more than 22 years where he has held senior management level positions in both marketing and underwriting. He joined BETA in 1995 and worked as a professional liability representative in the liability claims department for several years before transitioning to a marketing role. Mr. Grove has lead the BETA underwriting department for more than 14 years during which time the company’s net position has grown over 400%, a testament to the quality of BETA’s members and underwriting. He earned his Juris Doctor degree from Western State University College of Law, a Bachelor of Arts degree from San Diego State University and holds the Chartered Property Casualty Underwriter and Associate in Risk Management insurance designations.
About BETA Healthcare Group
BETA Healthcare Group (BETA) is the largest professional liability insurer of hospitals on the West Coast and provides coverage to more than 250 hospitals and healthcare facilities. In addition, BETA provides workers' compensation coverage for over 40,000 healthcare workers in California. BETA also has a long-established and growing commitment to physicians, providing medical professional liability coverage to over 6,000 physicians and more than 50 medical groups. Beyond primary liability and workers’ compensation coverage, BETA provides an entire suite of alternative risk and insurance services, including excess healthcare professional liability coverage, excess workers’ compensation coverage, third-party claims administration services, risk management consulting services and claims management consulting services. Whether with hospitals, medical groups, clinics or hospices, BETA has earned a reputation for financial strength, rate stability, quality service and breadth of coverage that is unparalleled in the industry. For more information, please visit www.betahg.com .
